name: brainpipe
title: Brainpipe
description: Sync actionable to-dos from markdown brain dump files to Notion
author: omarelamin

commands.name: runner-hourly
commands.title: Extract & Sync (Hourly)
commands.subtitle: Background sync of brain dump files
commands.description: Runs hourly in background to extract tasks from markdown files and sync to Notion

commands.name: runner-manual
commands.title: Extract & Sync (Run Now)
commands.subtitle: Manual sync trigger
commands.description: Manually trigger extraction and sync of brain dump files to Notion

preferences.name: inboxDir
preferences.title: Brain Dump Directory
preferences.description: Directory path containing markdown brain dump files

preferences.name: openaiKey
preferences.title: OpenAI API Key
preferences.description: Your OpenAI API key for task extraction

preferences.name: openaiModel
preferences.title: OpenAI Model
preferences.description: OpenAI model to use for task extraction

preferences.name: notionDbId
preferences.title: Notion Database ID
preferences.description: The ID of the Notion database to sync tasks to

scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "Preparing for publish..." && npm run build
